Verses: 1 aadhaam Than Manaiviyaagiya Evaalai Arindhaan; Aval Garppavadhiyaagi, Kaayeenaip Petru, Karththaraal Oru Manushanaip Petren Endraal.
2 pinbu Avanudaiya Sagodharanaagiya Aabelaip Petraal; Aabel Aadugalai Meykkiravanaanaan, Kaayeen Nilaththaip Payiridugiravanaanaan.
3 silanaal Sendrapinbu, Kaayeen Nilaththin Kanigalaik Karththarukkuk Kaanikkaiyaagak Konduvandhaan.
4 aabelum Than Mandhaiyin Thalaiyeetrugalilum Avaigalil Kozhumaiyaanavaigalilum Silavatraik Konduvandhaan. Aabelaiyum Avan Kaanikkaiyaiyum Karththar Angigariththaar.
5 kaayeenaiyum Avan Kaanikkaiyaiyum Avar Angigarikkavillai. Appozhudhu Kaayeenukku Migavum Erichchal Undaagi, Avan Muganaadi Verupattadhu.
6 appozhudhu Karththar Kaayeenai Nokki: Unakku En Erichchal Undaayitru? Un Muganaadi En Verupattadhu?
7 nee Nanmai Seydhaal Menmai Illaiyo? Nee Nanmai Seyyaadhirundhaal Paavam Vaasarpadiyil Paduththirukkum; Avan Aasai Unnaip Patriyirukkum, Nee Avanai Aandukolluvaai Endraar.
8 kaayeen Than Sagodharanaagiya Aabelode Pesinaan; Avargal Vayal Veliyil Irukkum Samayaththil, Kaayeen Than Sagodharanaagiya Aabelukku Virodhamaai Ezhumbi, Avanaik Kolaiseydhaan.
9 karththar Kaayeenai Nokki: Un Sagodharanaagiya Aabel Enge Endraar; Adharku Avan: Naan Ariyen; En Sagodharanukku Naan Kaavalaaliyo Endraan.
10 adharku Avar: Enna Seydhaai? Un Sagodharanudaiya Raththaththin Saththam Boomiyilirundhu Ennai Nokkik Kooppidugiradhu.
11 ippozhudhu Un Sagodharanudaiya Raththaththai Un Kaiyile Vaangikkollath Than Vaayaith Thirandha Indha Boomiyil Nee Sabikkappattiruppaai.
12 nee Nilaththaip Payiridumpodhu, Adhu Than Palanai Ini Unakkuk Kodaadhu; Nee Boomiyil Nilaiyatru Alaigiravanaayiruppaai Endraar.
13 appozhudhu Kaayeen Karththarai Nokki: Enakku Itta Thandanai Ennaal Sagikkamudiyaadhu.

14 indru Ennai Indha Dhesaththilirundhu Thuraththividugireer; Naan Umadhu Samugaththukku Vilagi Maraindhu, Boomiyil Nilaiyatru Alaigiravanaayiruppen; Ennaik Kandupidikkiravan Evanum Ennaik Kondrupoduvaane Endraan.

15 appozhudhu Karththar Avanai Nokki: Kaayeenaik Kollugira Evan Melum Ezhu Pazhi Sumarum Endru Solli, Kaayeenaik Kandupidikkiravan Evanum Avanaik Kondrupodaadhapadikkuk Karththar Avanmel Oru Adaiyaalaththaip Pottaar.
16 appadiye Kaayeen Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyaivittup Purappattu, Edhenukkuk Kizhakkaana Nodh Ennum Dhesaththil Kudiyirundhaan.
17 kaayeen Than Manaiviyai Arindhaan; Aval Garppavadhiyaagi, Enokkaip Petraal; Appozhudhu Avan Oru Pattanaththaik Katti, Andhap Pattanaththukkuth Than Kumaaranaagiya Enokkudaiya Perai Ittaan.
18 enokkukku Eeraadh Pirandhaan; Eeraadh Meguyavelaip Petraan; Meguyavel Meththoosavelaip Petraan; Meththoosavel Laamekkaip Petraan.
19 laamekku Irandu Sthreegalai Vivaagampanninaan; Oruththikku Aadhaal Endru Per, Matroruththikku Sillaal Endru Per.
20 aadhaal Yaabaalaip Petraal; Avan Koodaarangalil Vaasampannugiravargalukkum Mandhai Meykkiravargalukkum Thagappanaanaan.
21 avan Sagodharanudaiya Per Yoobaal; Avan Kinnarakkaarar Naagasurakkaarar Yaavarukkum Thagappanaanaan.
22 sillaalum Thoobaal Kaayeenaip Petraal; Avan Piththalai Irumbu Mudhaliyavatrin Thozhilaalar Yaavarukkum Aasaariyanaanaan; Thoobaal Kaayeenudaiya Sagodhari Naamaal.

23 laamekku Than Manaivigalaip Paarththu: Aadhaale, Sillaale, Naan Solvadhaik Kelungal; Laamekkin Manaivigale, En Saththaththukku Sevikodungal; Enakkuk Kaayamundaaga Oru Manushanaik Kondren; Enakkuth Thazhumbundaaga Oru Vaalibanaik Kolai Seydhen;
24 kaayeenukkaaga Ezhupazhi Sumarumaanaal, Laamekkukkaaga Ezhupaththezhu Pazhi Sumarum Endraan.

25 pinnum Aadhaam Than Manaiviyai Arindhaan; Aval Oru Kumaaranaip Petru: Kaayeen Kolaiseydha Aabelukkup Padhilaaga, Dhevan Enakku Veroru Puththiranaik Koduththaar Endru Solli, Avanukku Seth Endru Perittaal.
26 seththukkum Oru Kumaaran Pirandhaan; Avanukku Enos Endru Perittaan; Appozhudhu Manushar Karththarudaiya Naamaththaith Thozhudhukolla Aarambiththaargal.
